    • download_img

      protected boolean download_img(int size, String dest)
      The backend implementation of downnload_[size]_image. Cannot be accessed from outside.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the image, signified by 0, 1, or 2.
      dest - The destination folder.
      Returns:
      A boolean signifying whether the download succeeded.
